title: WATCH-WFDEI
comments: Combined forcing file (WFD 1901-1978, WFDEI 1979-2016) will be provided by ISIMIP. WFDEI precipitation and snowfall data are those corrected with GPCC. NOTE a discontinuity in the data exists at the transition from WATCH to WFDEI, and results must be interpreted with caution.

title: GSWP3-W5E5
comments: Combined forcing file (homogenized GSWP3 1901-1978, W5E5 1979-2016) will be provided by ISIMIP. To minimize discontinuities at the 1978/1979 transition, GSWP3 data were homogenized with W5E5 data using the ISIMIP2BASD v2.0 bias adjustment method.

title: GSWP3-EWEMBI
comments: Combined forcing file (homogenized GSWP3 1901-1978, EWEMBI 1979-2016) will be provided by ISIMIP. To minimize discontinuities at the 1978/1979 transition, GSWP3 data were homogenized with EWEMBI data using the ISIMIP2BASD v2.0 bias adjustment method.

title: GSWP3
comments: Based on dynamical downscaling. Further details on the global dynamical downscaling method are given in (Yoshimura & Kanamitsu, 2008) (Yoshimura & Kanamitsu, 2013).

title: PGMFD v.2
bias_target: CRU, SRB, TRMM, GPCP, WMO validated against GSWP2
